metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6790 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in KDE Plasma Workspace before 5.12.0. dataengines/notifications/notificationsengine.cpp allows remote attackers to discover client IP addresses via a URL in a notification, as demonstrated by the src attribute of an IMG element.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> Changes run-time behaviour of notifications in a way that is likely to cause regression bugs.

criterions.comment: plasma-workspace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
